sub_title: Accelerate Pentesting by 50% and reduce your TCO by 50% with BreachLock's Human-Led, AI-Enabled Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS)
summary:
Himanshu is a seasoned leader in the Information Technology Consulting & System Integration space with 15 years of industry experience. He has worked in multiple roles across Strategy, Practice & New Offering Development, Delivery Transformation & Key Account Management, & Sales Support.

On strategy and advisory, Hmanshu has experience in working closely with C-level client executives (CISO/CIO/ CTO) providing thought leadership, demonstrating value of a solution and helping them realize the same through successful delivery. Himanshu has proven experience in building new delivery organizations from start and successfully transforming them into mature global practices.
Himanshu has worked across industry sectors including retail, healthcare, telecom, travel &  transportation, financial and banking, among others.
His international experience includes engagements across geographies such as North America, South East Asia, Latin America, and Europe. 

He has been a keynote speaker at multiple Security forums and Organizations including IBM THINK, Infosec foundation CISO summit, International Center for Information Systems Audit, & Amity University.

awards.title: Mexico GDC Certificate of Recognition
awards.description:
Mexico GDC Certificate of Recognition awarded by GDC Director for outstanding commitment and
leadership in creation and consolidation of Data Security & Privacy practice in Mexico.

awards.title: CISM Geographic Excellence Award
awards.description:
CISM (Certified Information Security Manager) Geographic Excellence Award for highest score in
the Central/South America geographical region on the June 2014 CISM examination conducted by
ISACA.

awards.title: IBM WE DELIVER LATAM Winner
awards.description:
Awarded the regional Winner prize for being among top 3 in LATAM and best project (DS&P
Mexico) in Mexico in IBM WE DELIVER Contest.

awards.title: Eminence & Excellence Award
awards.description:
Received Orion Award as part of Eminence & Excellence Award 2012 for contribution to IBM
Security Practice

awards.title: Wipro CTO Award
awards.description:
Received Wipro CTO Trailblazer award for contribution in engagement with a Leading Financial
Services Company based in The Netherlands

awards.title: Vice Chancellor's Gold Medal
awards.description: Awarded by Govind Ballabh Pant Krishi Evam Praudyogik Vishwavidyalaya for highest academic performance in Bachelor of Technology degree (Mechanical), Class of 2001
awards.issuer: Govind Ballabh Pant Krishi Evam Praudyogik Vishwavidyalaya

profile_positions.description:
BreachLock is a Global Leader in Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS)
that makes staying resilient against cyber-attacks painless for 700+ active
clients in over 20 countries.
Empowering organizations to overcome the four fundamental challenges
faced with traditional PenTesting is what fuels BreachLock's
groundbreaking innovations.
BreachLock's unique manual, AI, & automation hybrid approach enables
the accuracy, agility, cost-effectiveness, and scalability demanded by
today's Offensive Security practices to combat tomorrow's emerging
threats.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer

profile_positions.description:
Himanshu is the Global Delivery Leader for IBM’s Security Strategy, Risk & Compliance practice. He leads a team of 300+ consultants in Global Integrated Delivery based out of India, Mexico and Poland.

He is responsible for the solutions that IBM brings to the market for the service offering, sales support, as well as delivery governance. He managed delivery of services across Security Strategy, Risk advisory, Regulatory Compliance as well as GRC Automation. He works closely with the global leaders to do market analysis, enhance IBM Security services portfolio by incubating new offerings and create strategies for Go To Market. He built IBM 's GRC automation practice which has since grown into a multi-million-dollar business with 50+ members global team. He is also responsible for managing alliances with product vendors.

Himanshu is responsible to build demand by working closely with IBM Partners and sellers across regions and help them sell through successful RFP responses, orals and competitive proposals.
profile_positions.title: Practice Leader, Cyber Security Strategy & Risk,  Global Integrated Delivery at IBM

profile_positions.description: Himanshu was responsible for managing Global Delivery teams of two of the largest strategic outsourcing accounts for IBM Security. These 120+ million dollar accounts have multiple complex solutions encompassing Security Strategy, Risk & Compliance, Identity & Access Management, Data and Application Security and Security Operations Centers. The team consists of 100+ security professionals.
profile_positions.title: Delivery Project Executive, Strategic Accounts

profile_positions.description:
Himanshu established IBM Security’s Global Delivery organization in Mexico as a greenfield project to build a strategic near-shoring capacity. This global delivery capacity is now central to IBM’s Security’s strategy as they strengthen their presence in Latin America as well as in the existing more mature North American business.

Besides Himanshu is also acting as a Global Integrated Delivery (GID) Relationship Manager for the LATAM Region; to help the region integrate Global Delivery model through sales and staffing support.
profile_positions.title: Security Services Leader, Mexico Global Delivery Center, IBM

profile_positions.description: Himanshu led Security Program for one of the leading European Telecom Clients for IBM as part of a large outsourcing contract. He was responsible for safeguarding IBM services under contract from security and privacy perspective. He lead a team of Security Consultants responsible for establishing Security Best Practices, Risk Assessments and supporting an independent third party audit. The program was successfully delivered resulting in a  clean audit report.
profile_positions.title: Security Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
As an experienced Senior Consultant with Deloitte & Touche, Hyderabad, Himanshu was responsible for providing consulting & project management services in IT Risk Management to a global client base. He provided solutions in, IT Risk Strategy, Policy Review & Development, Data Security strategy, Integrated Control Framework implementation, and GRC implementation.
• His responsibilities included Consulting & Project Management, proposals development, conducting client presentations and demos, and providing training on GRC and IT Risk Management Framework.
• Himanshu lead a dedicated group focused to support business development in Australia by working with the concerned Partners in Australia in proposal development, presenting solution demonstrations, and conducting PoCs.
• His key projects included Consumer Data Security Strategy & Program Management, Third party Security Reviews, GRC Implementation on RSA Archer platform.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a Manager with Governance, Risk Management & Compliance Practice of Wipro Technologies, Himanshu was responsible for providing Information Security Solutions.
• He provided solutions in Security Assessments, GRC implementation, User Access Management, SOX Compliance.
• His responsibilities included Providing Information Security solutions, Project Management, Proposals Development, Supporting practice development activities, Conducting Trainings for new hires, Project Quality Reviews.
• His key projects included, COSO ERM Implementation, SOX Controls Implementation, Security Assessment and Remediation Programs, GRC Solutions Implementation on RSA Archer platform.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.company: Tata Hitachi Construction Machinery Company Private Limited
profile_positions.description:
• As an ERP team member, he was part of version migration to SAP 4.6C.
• As a Business Process Owner with Quality Assurance his role included Process Analysis & Audits and ensuring adherence to the industry best practices like Six- Sigma.
• He was also responsible for compliance with ISO 9001-2000, ISO 14000 and Tata
Business Excellence Model.
profile_positions.title: Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: As a trustee with River Valley Trust, Uttarakhand, India, Himanshu is contributing into its multiple activities in the field of education. He has worked to develop a teachers´training program and innovative education program for the school run by the trust and also brought in professional approach to the way trust activities are managed.
